title: Attempting to Reconnect - NEED HELP ASAP
body: Whenever I join a game, as soon as the game starts I get an "Attempting to Reconnect". I can't do anything, I've tried repairing and I've restarted my computer countless times. NEED HELP ASAP

replies.body:
Just to confirm, are you using Time Warner Cable at all?  There were some widespread issues with them earlier this afternoon, but they should be fixed now.

Reply back and let me know if your issues still exist!
